product_name: SmartWool Funky Fairisle Tights - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Bright colors and eye-catching patterns make the girls' SmartWool Funky Fairisle tights a fun addition to her cold-weather wardrobe. She'll want to wear them every day until spring flowers bloom. Blend of wool, nylon and elastane offers soft warmth along with comfortable stretch and shape retention. SmartWool Funky Fairisle tights feature supportive arch braces and reinforced heel and toe panels. SmartWool tights are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Closeout.
